channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Experience Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Experience Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-3108|2024-09-17T01:50:46.521Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- experience%20manager
item.description: Adobe Experience Manager 6.2 and earlier has a malicious file execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-24445|2024-09-17T04:04:21.559Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- experience%20manager
item.description: AEM's Cloud Service offering, as well as version 6.5.6.0 (and below), are affected by a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could be abused by an attacker to inject malicious scripts into vulnerable form fields. Malicious JavaScript may be executed in a victimâ€™s browser when they browse to the page containing the vulnerable field.

item.title: CVE-2017-3107|2024-09-17T00:12:01.115Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- experience%20manager
item.description: Adobe Experience Manager 6.3 and earlier has a misconfiguration vulnerability.
